data.oai_dc:dc: This is the main file for solving global optimization problems. In this specific case pseudo-code 2 has been used for demonstrating the performance the algorithm. All the input values (i.e. dimension of problem, minimum and maximum function evaluations) are to be given here. To run this code, except the functions uploaded herein plese use the two function benchmarks.m and fgeneric.m from https://www.lri.fr/~hansen/cmaes_inmatlab.html which is an open sorce platform.
